author: IGN
description: Don't miss the 'Whispers in the Woods' DLC Reveal Trailer for Pacific Drive, the driving adventure survival adventure roguelite game developed by Ironwood Studio. Players will venture back into the fray of the  Olympic Exclusion Zone with a haunting expansion. Embark on a brand-new story with the iconic and customizable station wagon as a strange and mysterious part of the forests that call on the horizon. Experience brand-new junction types, anomalies, and anomaly behaviors as a mysterious group interacts with new dangers and mysteries to uncover. The 'Whispers in the Woods' DLC for Pacific Drive is launching in 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Pacific Drive - Official 'Whispers in the Woods' DLC Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Check out the Gameplay Teaser Trailer for Falcon Fall, a VR action shooter developed by Infinit Entertainment. Players can get a taste of gameplay from a moving helicopter in the heat of battle. Falcon Fall is coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Falcon Fall - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the '110 Years of Zombies in Pop Culture' Video for Dying Light: The Beast, the next addition to the first-person zombie action parkour game developed by Techland. Players can get the history of zombies across games and movies to see how zombies have evolved over the years, with slow zombies, fast zombies, and more. Dying Light: The Beast is launching on September 19 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official '110 Years of Zombies in Pop Culture' Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Superman DLC Teaser Trailer for Minecraft, the hit creative sandbox game developed by Mojang. Players can embody and become Superman himself making use of Super Strength, Heat Vision, and Super-Breath to dispatch enemies across Metropolis. Join Krypro in the Superman DLC, available now for Minecraft.
title: Minecraft - Official Superman DLC Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
One of the best ways to change Hornet’s abilities in Hollow Knight: Silksong is to find and equip different Crests. Crests change which types of tools you can equip and also modify how Hornet attacks. Here’s how to find the Crest of Reaper in Greymoor in Hollow Knight: Silksong.

00:00 - Intro
00:17 - Map Overview
00:36 - Walkthrough from Halfway Home (Greymoor)
01:11 - How to Fight Silk Snippers (Scissor Enemies)
01:38 - Walkthrough (continued)
02:44 - Optional: Unlock Nearby Shortcuts
03:29 - Chapel of the Reaper
04:16 - How to Unlock the Crest of Reaper
04:27 - How to Use the Crest of Reaper
05:05 - Outro

#IGN #Gaming
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong - How to Find The Crest of Reaper in Greymoor

author: IGN
description:
A new character comes to Dragonkin: The Banished. Watch the latest Dragonkin: The Banished teaser trailer for the ARPG to see what to expect with the update, which brings a new environment called Erde-Nor and the Tracker, a master huntress, who joins the fight. With a mix of powerful ranged attacks, devastating close combat abilities, and a slow-acting poison, The Tracker has everything needed to take the fight to the Dragon lords. Dragonkin: The Banished is available now in Steam Early Access, and The Tracker update will be available on September 16, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dragonkin: The Banished - Official Tracker Update Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the new Detective role available in Among Us in this latest trailer for the social deduction action puzzle game. Keep track of a dead Crewmate's location, your list of suspects, and what kind of Impostor you're looking for with the Detective role. Update 17.0 for Among Us is available now on all platforms.

Among Us is a game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space! Play online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone. Try different roles, Hide n Seek mode, and customize your Crewmate!
title: Among Us - Official New Detective Role Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into what you can expect from the new Viper role in this latest Among Us trailer. Use your Acid ability and watch the Crewmate's body slowly melt away. No evidence of any crime? No reason to call an Emergency Meeting. Update 17.0 for Among Us is available now on all platforms.

Among Us is a game of teamwork and betrayal for 4-15 players...in space! Play online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone. Try different roles, Hide n Seek mode, and customize your Crewmate!
title: Among Us - Official New Viper Role Trailer

author: IGN
description:
IGN’s Seth Macy is exploring everything that PAX West 2025 has to offer, like awesome collectibles, first looks at the hottest upcoming games, and of course, exciting glimpses at new hardware. Seth is checking out some of the biggest names in PC and PC accessories like Lenovo Legion, Razer, Arcanium, and MSI… But Framework might just be the dark horse we needed to make PC building fun again.

Presented by the Army National Guard.
title: This Modular Laptop Could Change The Game | PAX West 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Dune: Awakening trailer for the open-world survival RPG to see what to expect with the Lost Harvest DLC, which brings a new storyline, new vehicle, new building pieces, cosmetic skins, and more. The Lost Harvest DLC for Dune: Awakening is available now on PC (Steam).

Alone or with friends, explore a vast open world Arrakis, survive the sandworms, build a home, craft an ornithopter, and unravel the mystery of the missing Fremen in Dune: Awakening.

#DuneAwakening #Gaming #IGN
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Lost Harvest DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Deep Burn Limited-Time Event Gameplay Trailer for The Outlast Trials, a co-op action horror game developed by Red Barrels. Players can soon partake in this new Limited-Time Event, where Murkoff turns up the heat with new flaming hazards, fire-spewing traps, and an increased presence of the Pitcher: Murkoff’s resident and unhinged pyromaniac. Overcome these fiery challenges with the Deep Burn Limited-Time Event, available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#TheOutlastTrials #Gaming #IGN
title: The Outlast Trials - Official Deep Burn Limited-Time Event Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Infiltrating The Lawless Frontier' ViDoc for Destiny 2: Renegades, a Star Wars-inspired DLC expansion developed by Bungie in collaboration with Industrial Light and Magic. Players can hear straight from developers on the process behind bring the Galaxy Far, Far Away to the Destiny universe with Destiny: Renegades. Smuggle, deal with a plethora of Crime Syndicates, and explore the criminal underworld while blending the lore of Destiny 2. Wield a lightsaber in Destiny 2: Renegades, launching on December 2 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#Destiny2 #IGN #Gaming
title: Destiny 2: Renegades - Official 'Infiltrating The Lawless Frontier' Dev Update

description:
Check out the Chapter 2 Free Update Trailer for Dune: Awakening, an open-world survival MMO developed by Funcom. Players can now access the new Chapter 2 Free Update for Dune: Awakening fitted with new story content, character re-customization, dynamic encounters, combat additions, Deep Desert improvements, and more for players to explore and enjoy. Explore the new Chapter 2 Free Update now for Dune: Awakening, available now for PC (Steam).

#DuneAwakening #Gaming #IGN
title: Dune: Awakening - Official Chapter 2 Free Update Trailer

description: September's IGN First continues on with nearly 20 minutes of gameplay from the upcoming Nioh 3, highlighting one of the new open ended levels and some the activities and optional bosses you can find while exploring.
title: Nioh 3 - 19 Minutes of Open Exploration Gameplay - IGN First

author: IGN
description:
It’s been 30 years since the launch of the original PlayStation, but the definitive ranking of the best PlayStation games is still up for debate. 

From the jorts-wearing Crash Bandicoot to the no-nonsense Solid Snake, the original PlayStation is single-handedly responsible for some of the most iconic video game characters and franchises. But which PS1 games are the best of the best? Let's decide once and for all.

#IGN #PlayStation #PSX
title: Top 25 Best PS1 Games of All Time

author: IGN
description:
Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection is available now on PC (Steam), Xbox, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Nintendo Switch. Check out the Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection launch trailer for this platformer collection for a peek at Bubsy's adventures. Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection features the following games: Bubsy in: Claws Encounters of the Furred Kind (Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Super Famicom, SEGA Genesis), Bubsy II (Super Nintendo Entertainment System, SEGA Genesis, Game Boy), Bubsy in: Fractured Furry Tales (Atari Jaguar), and Bubsy 3D (PlayStation). Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection also features exclusive interviews and behind-the-scenes looks at how the bobcat came to life.

#BubsyInThePurrfectCollection #Gaming #IGN
title: Bubsy in: The Purrfect Collection - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Legacy of the Forge DLC Launch Trailer for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2, an action RPG developed by Warhorse Studios. Players can now access the new DLC for the game that sees players return to Kuttenberg to meet new characters and take over a burnt forge in ruins. Design the forge, customize private quarters, and become a true blacksmith. The Legacy of the Forge DLC for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#KingdomComeDeliverance2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Official Legacy of the Forge DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Helmed by Colin Minihan (Grave Encounters), the film follows a family who must fight for survival as a pack of savage coyotes closes in on their Hollywood Hills home.

Starring Justin Long, Kate Bosworth, Mila Harris, and Brittany Allen, Coyotes will premiere at Fantastic Fest on September 20, 2025, prior to its theatrical release on October 3, 2025 via AURA Entertainment.

#IGN
title: Coyotes - Exclusive Red Band Trailer (2025) Justin Long, Kate Bosworth

description:
Get a look at new gameplay from Unyielder, an anime-influenced, fast-action boss-rush first-person shooter roguelite focused on hardcore 1v1 boss fights. It will be released on September 29 for PC via both Steam and the Epic Games Store. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/789940/UNYIELDER/

description:
Don't miss the 'This Is an Xbox That Goes Vroom' Trailer for the Xbox Cloud Gaming Beta, a cloud streaming platform for Xbox hardware and games. Players will soon be able to make use of the Xbox Cloud Gaming Beta in select cars in partnership with LG, courtesy of LG's Automotive Content Platform powered by webOS with Xbox. Xbox Cloud Gaming Beta is coming soon to select vehicles.

#Xbox #Gaming #IGN

description:
Get your first look at Doomsday Diner, a new post-apocalyptic first-person shooter in which you also manage a diner. Check it out and you might find that, like peanut butter and chocolate, it's two unique tastes that taste great together. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3846290/Doomsday_Diner/

description:
The story of legendary mixed martial arts & UFC fighter Mark Kerr. Check out the new The Smashing Machine trailer for this upcoming film from writer/director Benny Safdie and starring Dwayne Johnson and Emily Blunt.

The Smashing Machine opens in theaters on October 3, 2025.

#TheSmashingMachine #Movies #IGN

author: IGN
description:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants reviewed by Luke Reilly on PC. Also availabel on Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

"Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants can be whipped through in a single afternoon, but during that short run it takes you through a beautiful array of new locations to explore and presents several puzzles that are even better than those in The Great Circle itself. It probably would’ve been better value as a more replayable, separate mode rather than stitched into the main story but, in an environment where some of my favourite single-player games are being bastardised into games-as-a-service hellscapes, I can’t say I’m against anything that extends my time with a lavishly crafted solo adventure like 2024’s Indiana Jones, even if it’s only by another four or five hours."
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants Review

title: How to unlock Silksong's permadeath mode

author: IGN
description: Think Hollow Knight: Silksong is a little too easy? Want an alternate game mode that will really put you to the test? Well, there’s a secret way to crank up the difficulty. By entering a special variation of the Konami Code, you can unlock Steel Soul mode – Silksong’s punishing permadeath challenge, where one death means game over, permanently. In this video, we’ll break down exactly how to enter the code, what happens when you activate it, and why this mode is the ultimate test for Silksong fans.
title: Make Hollow Knight: Silksong MUCH Harder With This Hidden Cheat Code
